name: Snowman Souls (Evdokimov)
description:
Snowman Souls is topdown puzzle made for Ludum Dare 50
Spring is coming and melt is inevitable!
-----
Controls: WASD or Arrows
-----

Autors:

Alex Evdokimov - Gamedesign, Animation
